# Pacotes do R


```{r pacotes_dados, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}

require(tidyverse)
require(kableExtra)

dados <- read.csv(file = "data/turnover-data-set.csv")

dados %>% 
  head %>% 
  kbl %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))

```
